txt_en: Never stop believing in yourself.
txt_cn: 永远不要停止相信自己。

txt_en: Love is magical.
You don't know until you try.
txt_cn: 不尝试，就不会知道结果。

txt_en: Enjoy your life. And love your parents.
txt_cn: 好好生活，好好爱你的父母。

txt_en: Caution is wise.
To my eyes, you are perfect.
Let my fight beside you.
Life is beautiful. The girls are beautiful.
Always be yourself.
First time is always the hardest.
There is no greater form of trust than love.
txt_cn: 无保留地爱你，就是对你最大的信任。

txt_en: Plant your trees,watch them grow.
txt_cn: 种下属于你的树，守护着它长大。

txt_en: Don't waste your gift!
I don't just seek justice, I stalk it.
txt_cn: 我不仅要寻求正义，我还要追随正义。

txt_en: It never hurts to be friendly.
txt_cn: 对人友善点没什么坏处。

txt_en: Sometimes things turn out the way they should.
txt_cn: 有时，事物的发展都是自然而然的。

txt_en: There's no greater gift than love.
Waiting is the hardest part.
Love is our true destiny.
There's a hint of spring in the air.
txt_cn: 空气中弥漫着春天的气息。

txt_en: Whoever saves one life, saves the world entire.
txt_cn: 挽救了一条生命，就等于挽救了整个世界。

txt_en: It is time to take the next step on your journey.
txt_cn: 是时候开始你的下一段旅程了。

txt_en: Winners will never retreat.
You've got to make your own luck.
